title: Texas DPS releases video of altercation with Uvalde victim's mother
description: The Texas DPS has released two videos depicting an altercation between one of its troopers and the mother of one of the students who died in last year's Uvalde shooting.

title: Missing 6-year-old boy believed to be dead, warrant out for mother's arrest: Police
description: The search for a missing 6-year-old Noel Rodriguez-Alvarez is now a death investigation, police said Thursday, while vowing to find his body.

title: ‘Gangsta’s Paradise’ rapper Coolio's death fentanyl-caused
description: Coolio, the rapper best known for hits in the 1990s including “Gangsta’s Paradise” and “Fantastic Voyage,” died last year because of fentanyl

title: 660-mile rescue flight highlights Alaska's unique challenges
description: The Alaska Air National Guard this week traveled nearly 660 miles to rescue a pregnant woman on a small island 2 miles from Russia

title: Biden vetoes bill that sought to toss EPA water protections
description: Defending his administration’s actions on clean water, President Joe Biden on Thursday vetoed a congressional resolution that would have overturned protections for the nation’s waterways that Republicans have criticized as overly intrusive

title: Church child sex abuse allegations from more than 600 victims detailed in new report
description: Alleged church sexual abuse of more than 600 children under the Baltimore Catholic Church detailed in new report from Maryland Attorney General.

title: 3 Alaska Native tribes sue to block major gold mine project
description: Three Alaska Native tribes have sued to block what they say would be one of the largest gold mines in the world

title: Clarence Thomas reportedly received years of gifts from GOP donor, stirring scandal
description: Clarence Thomas accepted luxury travel and hospitality perks from billionaire Republican donor Harlan Crow, ProPublica reported, igniting controversy

title: Police: 4 dead in plane crash off Florida's Gulf Coast
description: Police say the bodies of two men and two women have been recovered following a small plane crash just off Florida's Gulf Coast

title: Supreme Court refuses to reinstate state's ban on trans girl playing girls sports
description: The Supreme Court has denied West Virginia's request to reinstate a law banning trans students from participating in sports teams consistent with their gender identity.

title: Biden admin shares reports on Afghanistan withdrawal with Congress
description: Te Pentagon and State Department are set to share with Congress their after-action reports on the 2021 military withdrawal from Afghanistan, according to a U.S. official

title: Officials credit alert student for preventing potential school shooting
description: Local officials in Ohio are commending the quick thinking of an alert high school student who they say potentially averted a school shooting.

title: Former NBA guard Ben Gordon arrested on weapons charge
description: Police say former NBA guard Ben Gordon was arrested on weapons and threatening charges after he began behaving erratically in a Connecticut juice shop

title: Judge in Trump's criminal case has received dozens of threats, police sources say
description: Judge Juan Merchan, who is overseeing the criminal case against Trump, has received dozens of threats in recent days, police sources told ABC News

title: King Charles III supports probe into monarchy's slave ties
description: King Charles III for the first time has signaled support for research into the British monarchy’s ties to slavery

title: Protests again grip France but Macron not backing down
description: Protesters have disrupted vehicle traffic at Paris’ main airport and marched in their thousands again in other French cities with strikes and demonstrations to get President Emmanuel Macron to scrap contested pension reforms

title: Tennessee state House to vote on expelling 3 Democratic lawmakers
description: The Republican-controlled Tennessee State House of Representatives will convene Thursday to vote on ousting three Democratic lawmakers.

title: WATCH:  Police rescue baby, others from burning home
description: Dramatic video shows police in Frankfort, Indiana, scrambling up a ladder to rescue a baby and other occupants from a burning home.

title: FDA forces unproven premature birth drug Makena off market
description: The Food and Drug Administration is ordering an unproven drug intended to prevent premature births off the market

title: Applications for jobless aid rising but still at low levels
description: The number of Americans seeking unemployment aid was higher over the past few months than the government had initially reported, reflecting a modest rise in layoffs as the economy has slowed in the face of higher interest rates

title: IMF head expects less than 3% global economic growth in 2023
description: The International Monetary Fund chief is warning the world economy is expected to grow less than 3% in 2023, down from 3.4% last year, increasing the risk of hunger and poverty globally

title: Snake on a plane! South African pilot finds cobra under seat
description: A pilot in South Africa made a hasty emergency landing after discovering a highly venomous cobra hiding under his seat

title: Harvard students held at gunpoint during police raid of dorm
description: Several Harvard students say they woke to armed officers after a hoax 911 call sent officers to dorm.

title: Honda recalls CR-Vs in cold states to fix frame rust problem
description: Honda is recalling nearly 564,000 older small SUVs in the U.S. because road salt can cause the frame to rust and rear suspension parts to come loose

title: China vows 'forceful' measures after US-Taiwan meeting
description: China is vowing reprisals against Taiwan after a meeting between the United States House speaker and the island’s president, saying the U_S_ is on a “wrong and dangerous road.”

title: Macron in China wants 'common path' on peace in Ukraine
description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping has called for peace talks over Ukraine after French President Emmanuel Macron appealed to him to “bring Russia to its senses."

title: Idaho governor signs 'abortion trafficking' bill into law
description: The new law is the first of its kind in the United States and comes less than a year after Idaho banned nearly all abortions.

title: 'Vicious cycle': Inside the police recruiting crunch with resignations on the rise
description: Police departments across the country are facing a "vicious cycle" of retirements, resignations, and fewer hires.

title: Japanese army helicopter carrying 10 crew members missing
description: Japan’s coast guard says it is searching for an army helicopter carrying 10 crew members that went missing off a southern Japanese island

title: Berlusconi spends 1st night in hospital, said to be stable
description: Former Italian Premier Silvio Berlusconi is spending his second day in a Milan hospital, as family members continue to visit the ailing political leader in intensive care

title: Pope leads Holy Thursday service in Vatican basilica
description: Pope Francis has begun the first of two major Holy Thursday ceremonies

title: Inside the 3 so-called 'catch and kill' payments in Trump's indictment
description: Three "catch and kill" accusations involving the suppression of negative stories comprise the pattern of behavior alleged in the indictment of former President Trump.

title: Rockets fired from Gaza raise tension as Passover begins
description: Palestinian militants fired a barrage of rockets early Thursday, setting off air raid sirens in southern Israel, as violence erupted for the second day in a row during a sensitive period of overlapping holidays

title: White House continues with "EGGucation" theme for Easter Egg Roll
description: The Easter Egg Roll returns to the White House on Monday, with first lady Jill Biden continuing her theme of "EGGucation."

title: Police hunt man who took platypus from the wild, showed it off to commuters on train
description: Australian police are hunting for a man who allegedly took a platypus from its natural environment and onto a train where he showed it off to commuters.

title: Idaho governor signs 'abortion trafficking' bill making it illegal to help minors get
description: Idaho governor signs 'abortion trafficking' bill making it illegal to help minors get abortion without parental consent

title: WATCH:  Man claims ‘Find My’ app glitch makes people think he stole their devices
description: A Texas man told Houston ABC station KTRK that almost a dozen people have knocked on his door over the last several years to accuse him of stealing their lost Apple devices.

title: WATCH:  Traffic slows for moose on Massachusetts roadway
description: Traffic slowed to a crawl in Massachusetts as a wandering moose enjoyed a stroll before making its way back into the woods.

title: Jill Biden accepts tulip named for her by the Netherlands
description: Tulip lovers have a new variety to choose from and it's named for Jill Biden

title: McCarthy meets with Taiwan's president as tensions mount between Washington, Beijing
description: The meeting marks the highest-profile encounter between a U.S. and Taiwanese leader on American soil since the end of formal diplomatic relations in 1979.

title: Arkansas House OKs social media age verification requirement
description: An effort to require parents' OK for Arkansas children to access social media sites is advancing through the state Legislature

title: New Mexico governor signs bill to shield abortion providers
description: Democratic New Mexico Gov. Michelle Lujan Grisham has signed legislation that protects providers of abortions from prosecution or extradition attempts by out-of-state interests

title: Stepmom in murder trial over boy's death says 'I don't kill'
description: The father of an 11-year-old Colorado boy found dead in Florida, took the stand to testify against his now ex-wife, who is on trial for killing the boy
